diff_hunk:

     name = FuzzyUnicode()
     implementation = 'console.log("test");'

body_text: Factories don't yet have a Django model when they are being built (when this is called), so I duplicated this logic from the model. There is a test in test_factories.py to make sure this stays in sync.
